Text: CAM Corporate Committee action required by October Cc To all Corporate Committee Members As a Committee Member you are asked to thumb through your rolodex and find those contacts that would be most interested in supporting the Contemporary Arts Museum This year we would like to start the thinking process before the November st meeting to avoid leaving out any potential targets Therefore we are asking that each of you identify three to five possible companies with your contact names and fax or email them to Amber Winsor at or by pm Tuesday October We will approach these companies to join as a corporate member at the or levels You can decide which level to ask for and you will be a signature on the request letter At the meeting we will identify cosigners to help improve the chances for a successful response from these prospects FYI for those of you who cannot attend the November st meeting this step is even more important It will bring your voice and ideas to the meeting if you cant be there in person Thank you Karen Skaer Soh Director of Development Contemporary Arts Museum Amber Winsor Development Associate Contemporary Arts Museum
